cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on July 29, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4618, Short Sale Transparency and Market Fairness Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 129 (Thursday, July 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 4618.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H3844]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 27 - 22.

title: Short Sale Transparency and Market Fairness Act
